data.name: RPGScenery - Medieval Port Scene
data.detailed_description:
The harbor is located at the end of a peninsula, behind which a huge mountain rises high. Stone houses were built around the wooden docks, giving places to inns, traders, port customs, city guards, and who knows what else. On the streets, merchants sit under their canvas-covered stands, offering their wares for arrivals or departures. Looking back towards the sea, you can see a distant island above which a huge stone statue rises, holding an eternally burning fire in its giant hands which shows the way for sea travelers.

This DLC contains 6 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
